description:
NFL Pro is back on your smartphone and tablet. As the only free-to-play football simulation game, NFL Pro 2014 is now more immersive, more realistic and more social.

PLAY THE 2014 SEASON AND SUPER BOWL 
Thanks to the official NFL license, you can choose your favorite team among any of the 32 franchises. 
Lead your team through exhibition and season matches all the way to victory at the Super Bowl!

A REAL SOCIAL EXPERIENCE – FOOTBALL THE WAY YOU LOVE IT
Invite your friends to join the fun and compete against them for the top spot on of the Facebook Leaderboard.
Add friends and share your progress and achievements in-game via Facebook

TAKE THE ACTION TO THE FIELD
Thanks to enhanced graphics, enjoy revamped crowd and environmental effects, making your Football experience more realistic than ever. Think you have what it takes to choose the right play at the right time and go all the way? 

MANAGE YOUR TEAM ON AND OFF THE FIELD
Control every aspect of your NFL team through the Management system: Hire players, upgrade their skills and put them on the path to glory.
Upgrade your stadium to increase your income, and practice your favorite plays to optimize your team’s performance. 
Choose from 200 plays that you can now permanently learn and edit thanks to the Playbook Editor. 


_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com
Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.
Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft 
Discover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.

_____________________________________________

This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.
trackCensoredName: NFL Pro 2014 : The Ultimate Football Simulation
trackName: NFL Pro 2014 : The Ultimate Football Simulation
